dct_description_sm: Map of Japan, Korea and part of China; relief shown pictorially. French text on verso: L'isle de Japon. Probaby issued in: Nouvel atlas, ou, Theatre du monde ... Amstelodami : apud Ioannem Ianssonium, 1647-56.
rights_statement_s:
No Known Copyright
